column4: guys is there an easy way to getting to my own posts in ubuntuforums? The 'Subscribed Threads' area in User CP does not show them in my profile... which i find quite unusual
thats what i am doing right now.. but it will not alert me when there's an update on my thread.. besides that method is easy right now becaus i only have 15-16 posts.. it will become unwieldy later
um... are you having trouble remembering posts you personally made? =P
